website_summaries.verdict: A good, economical car diffuser you can also use in the home or office. Unique features for the price.
pros: LED lights change colors for mood lighting
You can set the color, have them cycle, or turn it off for safer driving if necessary
The diffuser will automatically shut off when oil or water starts to run low
cons: Smaller volume of oil does not last as long as other options

customer_reviews.title: Big things come in small packages !
customer_reviews.text: I received this in the mail yesterday, and it works just as expected . I love that it will shut off if water runs out to keep from ruining the diffuser . I also love that there are several ways to use this ( changing colors/no colors/one color of choice/ intermittent mode and regular mode) and it’s portable ! Great product ! Inexpensive too . I got a 1.5 yr warranty also. I drive for Uber /lyft and do medical transports and sometimes have different smells such as smoke in my car ; this should help immensely :)
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a road trip or morning commute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 14 hour road trip and it was the best idea! We filled it up, added oils and it worked perfectly. Lasted for a while considering it is so small. Fits perfect in a cup holder and plugs into a USB.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Needs replacement cord
customer_reviews.text: I should have given it a 5 stars, but no, since the cord connecting to the car charger broke easily, i don’t know if they have replacement for that, if yes, i will give them 5 star, i luv this aromatherapy device since it helps me a lot to breathe while i’m driving. Edit: Excellent customer service, they sent me right away a replacement .... 5 star!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marita

customer_reviews.title: The BEST little car and small area diffusers I have ever found !!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best diffusers that use a USB as a plugin. The output is so strong and Im pretty thrilled with it as I have gotten so many and they are not good at all. This one is the perfect size and fits nicely in my cupholder in the car. No more wet doggy smells lol I also have one plugged into my computer at my desk. the light changes color which if you dont want to light on there is an ON/Off switch. For this price you need to get these as gifts!!! and of course contact me about getting doterra essential oils to use in it ! :) you seriously will love this
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cowart

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design- don’t buy this one
customer_reviews.text: This is an awful diffuser! No steam ever comes out because of the poor design. Everything get trapped in the reservoir which causes it to over heat. I had this running for 8 hours and the water level never went down. Horrible. I buy 5-8 diffusers a year from amazon and they all function the same. Except for this one. Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: klamp

customer_reviews.title: Nice little diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered many diffusers and nebulizers through the years and this is a great diffuser that I keep right by my computer. It is small and is for small areas, so do not expect it to work in large areas. I have used this for two months and so far no problems. I like that it has an extra cover over the water and essential oils, it makes the mist very fine. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: They sent me a replacement for free.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this because it leaked. The refund process was quick though. - The newer version has an inner cap, so no more leaking. However, the unit always stops diffusing eventhough there is still some water left inside. You can easily add the water into it though and it will resume working.
customer_reviews.author: Napitupulu Astri

customer_reviews.title: GREAT, This is my second one!
customer_reviews.text: This thing kicks the cool mist out hard and fast, both of mine work the same and are powerful little diffusers! I use one in the car and the other I move from my bedroom to the bathroom on occasion! Sooo worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: sÿsterwick

customer_reviews.title: No cotton wick needed for use. Auto shut off when water is below the minimum level
customer_reviews.text: Excellent diffuser for travel. Works with any usb wall plug. I bought this to help make the hotel rooms i visit more homey. I love that despite its small size, you don’t need a cotton wick to diffuse scents as i need multiples of those if i want to change the scent. With this unit, just rinse and change the oil as you feel like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sirhc

customer_reviews.title: Touchy
customer_reviews.text: Really touchy. If water is just a tad over, it will not start. Shuts of after just 30 minutes and plenty of water left. The strength of scent really depends on the quality of oils you use but that said, the stream of mist from this diffuser is so weak. If even for a small space such as your car or in our case our office. Will try in the car since reviews for use in the car is better but doubtful will perform any better in there. Will most likely return.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. I have 2 diffusers in my home and one in my classroom. I have been wanting one for the car, but they all seemed too small or awkward to use. This fits in the cup holder. Power cord is more than long enough to reach. It holds almost as much water as the one in my living room and classroom. Still works great after 2 months of daily use. I would highly recommend. Keep in mind that the intensity of scent depends on what brand of oils you use and how many drops you add.
customer_reviews.author: momof3

customer_reviews.title: leakes water everywhere no steam
customer_reviews.text: the instructions did not help me with my problem at all i filled up water right under the max line put in my essential oil. turned it on and water is everywhere must whill come out in chunks for 1 second then go back to just water squirting out everywhere so u thought maybe. to much water even tho it wasn't at the max line all the way so pilloried half out and still no steam water coming out the whole on top everywhere i was so excited to use this in my car
customer_reviews.author: jackie mejia

customer_reviews.title: Stops Working
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product two times. The first one lasted about two years and worked great. The second one had some major design changes, it is harder to fill and after about 3 months- just stopped working. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Nifty Product for the car
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my car. Everyone loves it! The tank could be a little bigger, but possibly the size is still good because it actually fits. Now, can't get the plug to go into the bottom anymore. :-( It looks a little rusted, but I don't know what the problem is.... It's broken! They reached out to me and gave me a replacement and that one is working fine. Great customer service. Guess what!? It stopped working again. I love this device so I will buy another, but from a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Live and Learn
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I came across this diffuser- small and is USB. After 3 months, it stopped working. I cleaned it out and wiped off the ultrasonic film, still nothing. The motor runs and lights up, but no mist. This was the 4th diffuser I have bought off of Amazon (i use others in different rooms at home) and the first time one has stopped working. Very disappointed. Of course, it stopped misting after the return date has passed.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Works, but too small for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I am using it next to my computer which is also powering the diffuser. I works steadily..I have at the intermittent setting. The output is not enough to feel the difference (with or without the essential oil) but, in truth, the little guy is working as hard as it is supposed to. It is not its fault. I believe it is just too small for the job. Otherwise, it is well made and, thus far, it has been working well.
customer_reviews.author: MMS

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!! Noisy as HELL!! - UPDATED REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a negative 5 stars if I could. I purchased this on April 27, 2019 to use in hotel rooms when traveling. It worked fine for my trip in May 2019 but my trip in November/December 2019 it is making so much noise!! It is noisy as HELL!! See video... UPDATED REVIEW - the manufacturer offered to replace the product or refund my purchase so I have revised my review from 1 star to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Chan

customer_reviews.title: GET IT NOW!
customer_reviews.text: This little portable diffuser is so cute and very high quality for the price! My boyfriend works driving 18 wheelers across country and I went with him for a few months. Not only does it have awesome color changing features, but it’s super quiet and releases a lot of scents and good stuff from the oils! Works like a charm. Super convenient that it plugs into a USB port!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen DePhillips

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far, I've only been running it for a couple days. Puts out a nice visible mist. The colored lights are useless during the day but really pretty at night. I just put a couple drops of essential oil and it gave a nice aroma in my van.
customer_reviews.author: Loren family

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in a week
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and gave as a gift to a friend who has been using some essential oils and has a longish commute. I just found out that she barely used it for a week before it stopped working. I wish she'd told me sooner though. We can't even tell what the issue is. Just won't work. I had such high hopes for this one, to give as gifts to other friends who've shown an interest in essential oils. It fits perfectly into the cupholder -seemed perfect :(
customer_reviews.author: Dram

customer_reviews.title: Love it for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this! I’ve been looking around for a car on for a while but couldn’t decide on which one, i absolutely love the price and how it’s looks in my car def worth it and i already had an oil from target (eucalyptus) and love the smell! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I would really like to give this product 5 stars but it only works when it wants to :\ I’ve studied the manual and done everything. When it works it does work very well. Sad to say I’ve seen many reviews where the diffuser just acts strange. Planning to return the product Edit: was shipped a new unit and this one seems to be working just fine I love how light and portable it is, thank you! Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: So far so good mini...but mighty
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today.The packaging was not wasteful, the instructions were easy to understand. It is currently running with the light function activated. It is cycling through soft pastel colors. I can't wait to bring this to work...it is the perfect size for a workspace. The mist is powerful I am currently sitting about 10' from this diffuser and the Ican easily smell my young living lavender. Now to keep my fingers crossed that this will work for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Petsch

customer_reviews.title: I would't recommend this!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product on Saturday and love every moment I had it, however it's now Tuesday, I've had it for a total of 4 days and it's now leaking out of the bottom and not misting. The light comes on now as soon as I plug it up (which didn't happen before, I had to turn it on) however nothing comes out of the diffuser! I can't get the light to turn off now unless I unplug it. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Service
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept it worked for about 3 hours and quit. The light works but it won't mist. The size is perfect and I like the light it gives a pop of color to my work station. Update: I heard from the company right away. I ignored it as I thought it was junk mail. They sent me a new unit. Would buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: luvmykindle413

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little gadget for a desk/small office
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little gadget for a desk/small office, we took it to a hotel and as long as it's right near your head on a nightstand then it makes a difference. This paired with a Breathe Blend oil made my bronchitis much easier to get over and continue to work without sounding like a TB patient.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Squiggles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work on my desk. My coworkers love it and have asked where I got it. It’s essential to get me through my day.
customer_reviews.author: ECW

customer_reviews.title: Love this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Love this diffuser. I have it plugged into my computer at my office and the color changing effect is very cheerful. The cord is rather short but honestly it's a small diffuser so I wouldn't expect it to be any longer than it is.
customer_reviews.author: BaileyElf

customer_reviews.title: Don't go without!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my daughter and she loved it, bought one for myself and I don't go anywhere without it! My husband is wanting one for his car! Living in LA with traffic and a preschooler in the cat is rather stressful at times. The ability to use a diffuser for aromatherapy in the middle of it is an amazing blessing! It works just like a home diffuser, so simple! The girl at Starbucks always comments on how good my car smells *****
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy i love it although if you move it it shuts off sometimes its still literally a lifesaver . I have asthma and felt like i couldnt breathe worked instantly when i put it under my nose . ❤️ thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rubi Takkouri

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I travel a lot for work and this is perfect for hotel rooms. Love the auto shut off feature and I can add my essential oils right into the water. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elise Kuhar-Pitters

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for campers
customer_reviews.text: This defuser is prefect for my camper. Compact and gets the job done really well. Love that it has a usb cord so it can run off the camper battery. Also the locking top is great to have as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed, It worked wonderful at first but stopped working ...
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed, It worked wonderful at first but stopped working (producing mist) with gentle, regular use after 5 days. I followed the care and usage instructions as stated, sad about this as I really wanted to love this product, while it still powers on it stopped producing mist. also I do not feel as though this product should be labeled "portable" as this must be plugged into a power source at all times. It runs by USB and a power plug was not provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable USB Diffuser with Warranty!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent little diffuser for my car! I already have purchased 5 other Innogear diffusers and am impressed with the reliability and quality. The only thing which I wish could be different in some future models is that the cord is plugged in the side, instead of the bottom, for convenience. I also think they have outstanding customer service and appreciate the 18 mo. warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Presbyterian Pastor

customer_reviews.title: You may need more oil for long lasting results.
customer_reviews.text: The materials are cheap. I get it is not an expensive item so i did not expect much. The oil seems to dissapate incredibly fast. Other than that i love it! The light is very bright and the item works well!
customer_reviews.author: Reb. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travelling
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a travel-size diffuser for his trips. This diffuser is really small, it fits the side of this backpack for drinks, and was actually allowed in an airplane carry-on bag. We have the same brand for our regular diffuser at home and so far no issues. Just don't get the recommended EO brand (onepure) as it failed the paper blot test.
customer_reviews.author: P&R

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this diffuser. I already have the InnoGear 100 mil, and I am totally in love with it. I opened it up, plugged it up, filled it with water, added a couple of drops of essential oil, pressed the mist button, and then.....nothing....absolutely nothing. No mist at all. Very disappointed. *UDDATE* I was contacted by InnoGear, and I was sent a replacement without even asking. The unit works great, good sized mist. I am happy with the customer service and follow up that I received. I would recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Morris

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality?!
customer_reviews.text: I would have give 5 stars but in a bit over a month I bought it, one of the buttons got stuck and never worked again, now only the light button works.
customer_reviews.author: dagbis

customer_reviews.title: Should be $10
customer_reviews.text: It is a little pricey for the size! You cannot change the color easily you have to wait for it to change then click the button again to keep it the same color. I have a truck so this works great I keep it in my back seat since I have USB outlets there.
customer_reviews.author: Only tell the truth about products!

customer_reviews.title: Great small diffuser
customer_reviews.text: i bought this essential oil diffuser so I could use it at home or in my car. It fits right inside my cup holder. It has a good mist and that is important to me. Shipping was fast, and questions were quickly answered.
customer_reviews.author: Foxxy2017

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for my desk, not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use..I have arthritis so I can't hold small pieces. It's the perfect size
customer_reviews.author: martydel1

customer_reviews.title: Portable USB essential oil humidifier that works
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I connect up to my laptop USB port and add oils to help chest congestion. It works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schultz

customer_reviews.title: customer support fixed their problem in a really nice way
customer_reviews.text: the first item broke after two usage and i returned it. their customer support is wonderful. replaced it with a brand new one and a courtesy box of essential oils. now i am a happy client without any complaints
customer_reviews.author: Denis W.

customer_reviews.title: Good value - use a power adapter
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. The only thing is it only works with a cigarette lighter adapter because the built in usb in my car doesn’t supply enough power for it to work. That’s not an issue but just an FYI for anyone planning to plug it into their car's usb.
customer_reviews.author: Spoof McGoof

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on a cruise. It worked very well. I would run it on the 30 seconds on and 30 seconds off with the light off for night time use and it would run all night. During the day I would run it with the light on and either full mist or on/off mode and I would always come back to a fresh smelling cabin. It kept the air moist and the oil I used smelled wonderful. Best of all we did not get sick on our vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my car! Fits perfectly in cup holder & I love the different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser spits water everywhere and doesn’t actually let the diffused stream out because the gurgling water blocks it and traps it inside. It also doesn’t work in my car which is the whole reason I got the portable one. I have another diffuser of this brand that I like but very disappointed in the portable one.
customer_reviews.author: MakersMariner

customer_reviews.title: Price is right. Great value
customer_reviews.text: Wish it could hold more and secured a little tighter. Still a great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Scott Prichard

customer_reviews.title: not good in truck
customer_reviews.text: Product worked decently in office but I couldn't drive more than a couple minutes - even trying to be slow! It shut off and wouldn't come back on. Returned (For those looking; bought a dodo, put off more mist and handled bumps and turns better but after first day it's not working - has power but nothing happens when buttons are pressed.)
customer_reviews.author: anona mouse

customer_reviews.title: Fan really noisy
customer_reviews.text: Nice little diffuser but the fan was quiet for about a week before something changed and now it’s super loud.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Used with Young Living EO’s and I LOVE! Fits in the standard cup holder of my car perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Fitzjurls

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand but mine stopped working EDITED
customer_reviews.text: It worked great at first but then it stopped working. I turn on the light button and it works then press the mist button and everything turns off. I'm so sad! EDITED: I was sent a replacement without even having to ask. So far so good with the replacement. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: jenny kirby

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work straight from the box. Cheap hunk of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Product Review by Kris

customer_reviews.title: Not intiutive
customer_reviews.text: Did not find helpful. I am sure there are better products around same price that work better.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Gies

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little electronic, very easy to work and runs for about 3 hours per fill up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great diffuser, perfect for my car.
customer_reviews.text: The diffuser is so powerful and is perfect for my car. I have been buying all sorts of other types of air fresheners, but they were just too weak to have much of an impact. This diffuser really puts out the scent and makes my car smell fresh and clean, very easy to set up and easy to use. The light looks great at night but is not distracting for the driver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this in my office where the winter heating renders ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this in my office where the winter heating renders low humidity atmosphere. This little gem is perfectly making improvements in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I travel. About the size of a soda can, it fits easily into my luggage and affords me diffused oils wherever I go.
customer_reviews.author: kjc

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled to have this!
customer_reviews.text: Iv'e used mine in the car for the last 4 mos. Friends and family all love it. I love how clean my car smells when I get in. Great for when you have a cold. Makes my commute feel extra special and even pampered a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Drew and Bonnie Casner

customer_reviews.title: Works good, not a lot of power
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really push the mist up far, but it works just fine. I'm sure a higher quality one covers more area.
customer_reviews.author: PookieAndTheBear_com

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful but I think it's great for small spaces
customer_reviews.author: Adriana B.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend purchasing this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser never worked properly. I tried everything in the manual to get it to work. I used it in a USB port, I used it with an adapter plug, I used it with varying levels of water. It never worked. It never diffused, only bubbled water all over the place. The water in the tank never got any lower because it did not diffuse the water into the air. I would not recommend purchasing this diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: A L Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great for the office
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this so far. It’s got a good range and doesn’t make things near it wet. Love it for the office.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Cromley

customer_reviews.title: Kept shutting off, but they replaced it hassle free!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and it keeps shutting off. Won’t run for longer than a minute :( read all the directions throughly and tried multiple things - still won’t work! Bummed. After this company found out about my problem they reached out to me and sent a brand new one, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Owens

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: this little diffuser really packs a punch! I use it in my bedroom and it really works to scent the entire room.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Hall

customer_reviews.title: Update 3 to 5
customer_reviews.text: Update Their CS reached out to me and offered to replace without me even asking. Pretty awesome! Thanks InnoGear! not working properly after appx 6 months of occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: GeckoGeek

customer_reviews.title: Honored my request for return .
customer_reviews.text: Great company. Honored my return after replacement date. Really love this design and lighting options .
customer_reviews.author: musicgirl

customer_reviews.title: Marvelously mobile Diffusor
customer_reviews.text: They pleasantly replaced the one from this summer. I really loved it so cross my fingers it keeps running. It's especially fabulous to have during covid19. We run all the anti virus oils in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Gbrim

customer_reviews.title: the white is definitely discolored (off white) like shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: it's an okay product. the white is definitely discolored (off white) like shown in picture. I thought I only got one light color but it was multicolored and you have to wait for the colors to change/rotate through to select the color I wanted. Remember.. this product only came with the USB not wall plug in.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my space
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my office to help keep the musty odors out as we are in a very old building. Everyone that comes into my office say they feel very relaxed and it feels like a spa.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shanks

customer_reviews.title: Great as a beginner diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Great as a beginner diffuser! It does not hold that much water but it is perfect for my office and will run for about 4 hours before needing to add more water. Super easy to use and the scent disperses evenly throughout the room. Color changing effect is very relaxing too.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: Great little diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little diffuser for my EO's! I use this one in my vehicle on a daily basis. I also have used it in a camper to keep it smelling fresh. The color changing "night light" is a fun feature, too!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and packs a great punch!! This little thing lasted my whole 8 hour shift without having to be refilled!! My at home, more expensive one doesn’t do that!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil diffuser! It’s small but it can easily be used in a small room. Quite big for a car unless you want your car to smell really strong! Works as expected and never had issues with it. Just be sure to follow the instructions and it will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Daiana Mailen Suleta

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, the size is perfect for tge area I wanted to place it in.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, compact and looks durable
customer_reviews.text: Very compact but easy to use! A diffuser that I can bring everywhere :) i like it’s size, 70 mL and the lights are cool too! You can make it steady in one light or make it change a couple of times. The only downside was the delivery was late
customer_reviews.author: Meryl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect forthe office and car
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered many of these. When everyone sees it they want one or two. Perfect forthe office and car. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Collins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the office!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can put it on constant or intermittent. Great for my office desk!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Not a  good diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Used twice and now not working . I will return this but will not be ordering this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: annchar

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Cute. We had a big one, but this one is really fit to the car and provide an aromatic air.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Y.

customer_reviews.title: Must get!!
customer_reviews.text: So far , I really like it! Just wish I got some aromatherapy oils for it. Can’t wait to put The other one on my desk at work!
customer_reviews.author: Nooshin

customer_reviews.title: Great little diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this diffuser. Its good quality and puts out a lot. Love using it in my car and also plan on using it as my travel diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Purcell

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my car! I love that it diffuses my oils and has a light show.
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: Portable diffuser
customer_reviews.text: compact diffuser that can be used in car or at desk. lights are a nice feature. easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The lights still work but the main function of the mist stopped working almost instantly. It’s a shame because the size is so convenient. My review is backed up by others who also have experienced it not working out of now where.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Broke shortly after use
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser broke after a month of use. It still turns on, but the mist doesn't comes out. I wish I would have paid a little extra and gotten a better more efficient product.
customer_reviews.author: David Brown

customer_reviews.title: Small Yet Powerful.
customer_reviews.text: 3rd diffuser I've had, the other two are 150ml, and this one is my favorite out of all 3. It may be small but it is powerful. I love that I can take it in the car too.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: I love that this little beauty fits in my car cup ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this little beauty fits in my car cup holder as well. I can diffuse essential oils while traveling to reduce stress, anxiety and fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not the right product
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the same product that was pictured.. it's way bigger and is 300ml
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The top of it is very hard to put back ...
customer_reviews.text: The top of it is very hard to put back on. Also it turns off even when it's still getting power from the USB and there is still water inside.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gargano

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good one.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I bought this to use in my office. It connects to my computer monitor and has no noise factor. It has lights on, if I want them but I usually keep them off and just have the moister in the air running. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Brantley

customer_reviews.title: it stopped working in less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a great purchase. But it stopped working in less than 2 months. Also if you are looking for something to spread the aroma through the air for your room, you might consider a bigger unit. This one is small enough it should be right beside you to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Bobba Fett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used these as give aways and this brand of diffuser works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M. Gleim

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised:  Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this diffuser to carry with me when I travel. I am often away from home and wanted to enjoy my essential oils on the go. The diffuser is very compact, so it is easy to pack. Although it is very light weight, it seems very sturdy and works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: icnddark

customer_reviews.title: I'm really enjoying the InnoGear. I have in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying the InnoGear. I have in my bedroom where I do a lot of reading and writing. The calming scents I use help me to get in the mood. Thanks, Amazon! Joan Gray
customer_reviews.author: Joan Gray

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lights and works!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and it is exactly as described. The lights are beautiful and the essential oils I bought to go with it work well. It is very quiet too.
customer_reviews.author: TristianElizabeth

customer_reviews.title: good price, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what is says it would do, good price, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: reader78

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had this product for a few weeks worked great. For some odd reason today it decided to ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for a few weeks worked great. For some odd reason today it decided to not work. When pressing the power button once it works constantly and approximately 10 minutes later it turns itself off. Can anyone help me out? What could I do?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE.... I requested a replacement and the replacement still does not work. I give up and returning.
customer_reviews.author: Tdew

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Lasts several hours. Wish it was a few hours more but overall simple to use, works well and impresses everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Pettit

product_meta.title: InnoGear USB Aromatherapy Essential Oil Diffuser Portable Aroma Humidifier Air Refresher for Office Home Car Vehicle Travel, White
product_meta.description:
Looking for a simple way to freshen your home, office or car air? InnoGear USB Aroma Essential Oil Diffuser is elegant and easy to use. Add water and a few drops of your favorite essential oil to enjoy aromatherapy treatment with lovely fragrance. Advanced ultrasonic vaporizing diffusion technology quietly releases a soothing fragrant mist. Safe automatic shut-off system protects the product from damage. Beautiful mood light to relieve stress while your are driving or at work. You have the option of just using the diffuser without the light.

Features
No filters required
Whisper-quiet operation
Auto shut-off for safety
USB powered
Dimensions: 5.1*2.7*2.7 inches
Capacity: 70ml

Package Contents
1x Car Aroma Diffuser
1x USB Cable
1x User Manual

Note
1. This diffuser is powered by USB, adapter is not included in the package.
2. When using in car, please use car adapter with 5V 1A. When using with laptop, please use with USB 3.0 Port.
3. Diffuser will automatically shut off when water level is low (When making a sudden stop while driving, water may pour out and diffuser may auto shut off).
feature_bullets: USB Powered and Compact Size: 5.1*2.7*2.7 inches, space-saving to be put on your office or home desk top, fits in vehicle cup holder to keep you company on the way back home or to work.
2 Misting Modes: Continuous and intermittent mist for your choice.
Space-saving Size - Having the USB car diffuser packed in your bag or suitcase makes it a mini humidifier within reach, convenient even when you are away on business.
Safe Auto-off Technology: Oil diffuser shuts off automatically when there is not enough water left in the tank.
All-In-One: Use as a portable diffuser, car air refresher or humidifier. Enjoy your essential oil anywhere to maintain a fresh and odor-free environment.
